competitors.name: BeProfit
competitors.difference: Strong in general analytics but not adapted to LATAM costs, MP fees, or cuotas. Escalafy is LATAM-first.

competitors.name: Lifetimely
competitors.difference: Focuses on LTV and cohorts. Escalafy focuses on daily profitability and operational decisions.

competitors.name: TripleWhale
competitors.difference: Optimized for US Shopify brands. Escalafy handles LATAM realities, Tiendanube, Mercado Libre, and MP payouts.

competitors.name: Google Analytics
competitors.difference: Analytics only. No real profit, cost, cashflow or SKU margin calculations.

competitors.name: Prax Analytics
competitors.difference: May provide analytics dashboards — but not built for LATAM-specific flows (Tiendanube, MP fees, cuotas, ML) nor real-time profitability + cashflow tracking.

competitors.name: EstadísticasNube
competitors.difference: Focus on Tiendanube metrics but lacks unified cost tracking, cashflow projection and multichannel profit analysis that Escalafy offers.

competitors.name: Northbeam
competitors.difference: Geared toward global ecommerce with ad attribution. Does not unify LATAM payment gateways, fees, and multichannel cost structure required to calculate real profitability in LATAM context.

deep_context.positioning_statement: Escalafy is the only tool built specifically for the financial realities of LATAM ecommerce: costs, fees, payout delays, multichannel complexity and hidden margins.
latam_specific_differences: Local logistics cost structure in LATAM
Mix of Tiendanube, Mercado Libre and Shopify channels
Delayed payouts common in LATAM gateways
High mismatch between ad ROAS and real profit due to regional cost structure
